ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 cup diced green onions with tops
1/4 cup seeded and chopped jalapeno pepper
recipe: In a large bowl, gently stir together the hominy, black beans, onion, green and red peppers, green onion, jalapeno, picante sauce, cumin, salt, sugar and cilantro.  Refrigerate at least an hour before serving.  Serve with tortilla chips on a bed of lettuce.
